thread.section_title: Hotel Claude Bernard Saint-Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay
thread.title_full: Lovely stay - Review of Hotel Claude Bernard Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mojonyman
title: Lovely stay
text:
Great location ie close to several Metro stations, Notre Dame,Pantheon and very central to sights in the Latin Quarter and St Germain.
The hotel staff were extremely helpful and friendly. The room was clean and very adequate for our needs. Although situated on a main road , we found noise level at a minimum. The lift was small but this is the norm for Parisian hotels of this type. No problem.
Room Tip: Contact hotel if you require room with balcony. See more room tips
